title: Blackstone to acquire controlling stake in Great Wolf Resorts, form $2.9 billion JV with Centerbridge
text: Private-equity giant Blackstone BX, -3.34% said Wednesday its Blackstone Real Estate Partners IX fund and units of Centerbridge Partners L.P. are acquiring a 65% controlling stake in Great World Resorts Inc., the owner and operator of 18 resorts around the country. As part of the deal, Blackstone has agreed to form a new $2.9 billion joint venture with Centerbridge to take ownership of the company. Blackstone shares fell 0.9% premarket, but have gained 58% in 2019, while the S&P 500 SPX, -1.23% has gained 17%.
